general_advisory: According to IMD, Bhubaneswar, Thunderstorm with very light to moderate rainfall is expected in the coming days. Make necessary arrangements for draining out excess water from crop fields in case of rain & stake creeping vegetable crops. Avoid spraying insecticides due to heavy wind speed forecasted in the next five days. Regular monitoring of insect and disease population in field and vegetable crops is advised.

advisory: Instead of manual DSR, follow mechanized DSR cultivation with appropriate practices
Go for summer ploughing by utilizing recent rain
Arrange good quality seeds of Dhanicha @12kg/acre as green manuring crop
Control mealy bug, scale insect & other sucking pests by spraying Thiamethoxam@80g/acre
To control early shot borer in sugarcane, foliar spray of Fipronil 5SC @400 ml/acre is advised
For timely planting, prepare nursery bed & treat seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed

To control Fruit and shoot borer, spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. Later, alternate spray Spinosad 45 SC @70ml/acre or Emamectin benzoate @80-100g/acre & Thiachloprid@250ml/l of water
For timely planting, prepare nursery bed & treat seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed

To control Fruit and shoot borer, spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. Later, alternate spray Spinosad 45 SC @70ml/acre or Emamectin benzoate @80-100g/acre & Thiachloprid@250ml/l of water
For timely planting, prepare nursery bed & treat seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed

To control Fruit and shoot borer, spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. Later, alternate spray Spinosad 45 SC @70ml/acre or Emamectin benzoate @80-100g/acre & Thiachloprid@250ml/l of water
For timely planting, prepare nursery bed & treat seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed

To control Fruit and shoot borer, spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. Later, alternate spray Spinosad 45 SC @70ml/acre or Emamectin benzoate @80-100g/acre & Thiachloprid@250ml/l of water
To control fruit fly attack, use fruit fly trap
Papaya - Drain out excess water from the root zone of the plant. Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus
To control fruit fly attack, use fruit fly trap
Papaya - Drain out excess water from the root zone of the plant. Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus
Provide drainage. Staking with bamboo and other sticks during fruit development stage to protect the plant against wind and rainfall
To prepare fish pond, apply lime @40-60 kg/acre based on PH & alkalinity value of water. Maintain water level of 5 ft. in grow out ponds.
Clean the shed & apply disinfectant to protect the animals from any disease outbreak
